street_name: Ash Grove Bus Depot Ash Grove (North) Hackney London E8 4RH
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission 2018/2104 dated 27/03/2019 for "Redevelopment of the site by the erection of a building up to 10 storeys in height to accommodate a 145 room hotel (C1 Use Class), and a 147sqm restaurant/cafÃ© (A3 Use Class) at ground floor level, with roof plant enclosure and other associated works". The effect of the changes would include: - Internal changes including an increase the number of bedrooms from 145 to 149 and changes to the layout of the lobby/restaurant areas at ground floor; - External alterations to include changes to fenestration and entrance doors; - Provision of fire doors at each level on northern boundary - Erection of two escape stairs.
